location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Public Department, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication dated 26 August 1817 and informing the Resident that a survey of the Persian Gulf is not currently practical, but that the extract from the log book of the Durabledescribing the rocks on which it was wrecked, will be published.
